title: Current 93 - Thunder Perfect Mind (1992) (folk) (mp3) (320 kbps)
description:
Current 93 - "Thunder Perfect Mind" (1992) (mp3) (320 kbps) (covers included)


This is the sister album to Nurse With Wound's "Thunder Perfect Mind", released at the same time.

David Tibet is the artist and main creative force behind Current 93.

It was reissued in 1994 with a change in the cover art: the picture of David Tibet on the cover had been replaced be a Louis Wain kitten.

The cover here is the original cover.

Edward Ka-Spel (of "The Legendary Pink Dots") is mentioned in the credits, but he didn't perform on this album.

All tracks are 320 kbps apart from track 14 (which is 192 kbps), which was missing at the original source so it comes from an alternative source.

Track 17 was originally a 'hidden track' appearing after 20 seconds of silence at the end of track 16.  Here it is marked separately as its own track.  But the track listing on the sleeve doesn't mention it.
